summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough
            - Section Title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Commander Beetle

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough

When you untangle yourself from the webbing, you'll find yourself high above the Webbed Hollow, on a mountain path leading to a large temple filled with Daoist martial artists.


After grabbing the Treasure Chest they were guarding, head right past a third green Wisp, and through a small ravine guarded by several Daoists to reach a large forested area.


Follow the pathway, and you'll find a set of stairs leading up to a large courtyard where a tough Yaoguai Chief is training a large group of Sword Daoists.

## Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Commander Beetle

Even when not slamming the ground, his bigger sword can also cut through the air to send a slicing wave of force at you from a distance, which comes out much faster than his slams, and can be done multiple times."
            - Following Text: "However, if he decides to hold his left weapon up by his face in a reverse grip fashion, it will become his shield, and he'll be able to soak any blows you try and land on him (even when Immobilized). Hit him too many times, and he'll launch into a swift two-hit counterattack. Luckily, you can counter his counter with a well-timed Rock Solid to throw him off."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
